text:
I post here a request I've send on Twitter for a French researcher, designer and developer (one of the authors of paged.js). Does anyone here know some resources about the question of "fear of programming by creative people"?

<https://twitter.com/ogadaki/status/1459551291584167943?s=20>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/ogadaki|@ogadaki>: Does someone know some good articles about the "fear" of programming/coding by creative people (graphic designers, artists, etc.)? <https://twitter.com/julieblancfr/status/1459544354113171456>
attachments.text: Does someone know some good articles about the "fear" of programming/coding by creative people (graphic designers, artists, etc.)? <https://twitter.com/julieblancfr/status/1459544354113171456>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/julieblancfr|@julieblancfr>: Je cherche des textes sur la « peur » de l'utilisation de l'informatique/du code chez les créatifs (designers graphiques, artistes, typographes, etc). Des ressources ? (<https://twitter.com/Jean_no|@Jean_no>, <https://twitter.com/NT_polylogue|@NT_polylogue>, <https://twitter.com/nolwennmaudet|@nolwennmaudet>, <https://twitter.com/AnthonyMasure|@AnthonyMasure>, <https://twitter.com/nicolastilly|@nicolastilly>)
attachments.text: Je cherche des textes sur la « peur » de l'utilisation de l'informatique/du code chez les créatifs (designers graphiques, artistes, typographes, etc). Des ressources ? (<https://twitter.com/Jean_no|@Jean_no>, <https://twitter.com/NT_polylogue|@NT_polylogue>, <https://twitter.com/nolwennmaudet|@nolwennmaudet>, <https://twitter.com/AnthonyMasure|@AnthonyMasure>, <https://twitter.com/nicolastilly|@nicolastilly>)

elements.text: I post here a request I've send on Twitter for a French researcher, designer and developer (one of the authors of paged.js). Does anyone here know some resources about the question of "fear of programming by creative people"?

text:
There are probably some folks here who would be into this:

<https://twitter.com/sc13ts/status/1459649147884036097>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/sc13ts|@sc13ts>: Would you watch a "have you tried rubbing a database on it" conference?

Thinking short demo videos of weird and non-traditional uses of database ideas eg writing a dvcs in sql (<https://www.fossil-scm.org/home/doc/trunk/www/theory1.wiki##h2>) or building a game engine around a shared database (<https://ourmachinery.com/post/the-story-behind-the-truth-designing-a-data-model/>)
attachments.text:
Would you watch a "have you tried rubbing a database on it" conference?

Thinking short demo videos of weird and non-traditional uses of database ideas eg writing a dvcs in sql (<https://www.fossil-scm.org/home/doc/trunk/www/theory1.wiki##h2>) or building a game engine around a shared database (<https://ourmachinery.com/post/the-story-behind-the-truth-designing-a-data-model/>)
